name: Hearty Minestrone Zuppa

ingredients.name: Nourish Broth
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or broth of your choice, prepared

preparation: Combine tomato sauce and prepared Bouillon in Multipurpose Pot. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce temperature to medium high.
Add next 4 ingredients and simmer for 30 min.
Stir in kidney beans and pasta. Cover and bring to a boil for 10 min, stirring twice, or until pasta is tender. Season to taste with Sea Salt & Pepper.
Sprinkle individual servings with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: A classic for a reason, this dressing mix is full of flavour and uber versatile. Use it as salad or nourish bowl dressing, marinade protein including chicken and beef, or glaze grilled veggies and fresh fruit. Any way you serve it, it’s sure to be a hit!
